name: minecraft-talk
description: A minecraft plugin allowing players to communicate over a website while playing.
author: Johannes Garz <jojogarz123@gmail.com> (https://www.garz.tech/)

scripts.install-all: yarn && cd webapp && yarn && cd ../backend && yarn
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "cd backend && yarn dev" "cd webapp && yarn start"
scripts.build: cd webapp && yarn build && cd ../backend && yarn build
